attributes.action: Ensure the BBC have the rights to broadcast all LIVE, International, Premier League, Championship and League 1&2 Football games.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seeing as everyone in the UK has to pay a TV tax/license, we should be able to watch any live UK football match during the season on a BBC channel. In particular international games when England/Ireland/Wales or Scotland are playing. It's our right, (when paying a tax to own a TV) to watch our national sport without having to purchase it through pay per view or at any other extra expense! We want the BBC to show all live games during the football season, because we have already paid for it.
